thread.title: Nebo Honored As Finalist In Three Categories For 2015 Platinum PR Awards
thread.title_full: Nebo Honored As Finalist In Three Categories For 2015 Platinum PR Awards

author: admin
title: Nebo Honored As Finalist In Three Categories For 2015 Platinum PR Awards
text:
Submitted by admin on 10/26/2015 @ 6:30 AM   Nebo Agency 
ATLANTA, Oct. 26, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- For the second year in a row, Nebo , an award-winning digital marketing and web design agency in Atlanta, has been chosen as a finalist in multiple categories for the 2015 Platinum PR Awards . The annual program hosted by PR News acknowledges the finest communicators, initiatives and organizations of the PR industry. Excellence is recognized in more than 40 categories, from crisis management to social media campaigns. 
Nebo has been selected for its work on the following campaigns: -- Build the BeltLine - Cause-Related Marketing -- Choose ATL - Pro Bono Campaign -- Choose ATL - On a Shoestring Campaign 
"Being recognized by such a reputable organization is an incredible honor," said Jenna Thomas, Senior Director of Digital Public Relations and Social Media Marketing at Nebo. "Our team has thoroughly enjoyed working on these campaigns to help local community initiatives. To have our efforts recognized at an international level by PR News is very humbling." 
The Atlanta BeltLine is a sustainable urban growth project that, once completed, will encircle the city with 33 total miles of multi-use trails, transportation networks and public parks. Nebo partnered with the BeltLine to launch a fundraising campaign - crafting slices of the original rail, which were sold for $99 apiece, with all funds going towards BeltLine programs and projects. Through a comprehensive public relations and marketing program, Nebo surpassed its goal of raising $35,000 within the campaign's first two weeks. 
The Choose ATL campaign is a community-driven initiative spearheaded by Nebo. By partnering with local entrepreneurs, politicians and business owners, Nebo crafted an extensive public relations and media outreach campaign to put Atlanta on the map as the ideal place to live, work and start a company. The campaign has generated more than 45 million earned media impressions to date, and it's still growing. 
Nebo joins prominent names in the industry as an honoree in this year's awards. Category contenders include Edelman, Ogilvy Public Relations, Porter Novelli and MSLGROUP. Finalists for the Platinum PR Awards represent the best and brightest of public relations. A panel of corporate, agency and academic executives, as well as staff at PR News, judge and select entries based on innovation, creativity, sound planning, implementation and outcomes. 
To learn more about Nebo and its award-winning projects, visit http://www.neboagency.com/work . 
About Nebo Agency: Nebo is a human-centered digital agency. We believe that great work comes from understanding the needs, wants and perceptions of your audience. This human-centered approach informs everything we do. With expertise in digital marketing strategy, web design, user experience, SEO, paid media, digital public relations, social media marketing, and analytics, Nebo has helped its clients achieve their digital goals. Visit http://www.neboagency.com for more information. 
To view the original version on PR Newswire, visit: http://www.prnewswire.com/news-releases/nebo-honored-as-finalist-in-three-categories-for-2015-platinum-pr-awards-300165753.html 
SOURCE Nebo Agency
